entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tensors in .NET #98323
  • [wasi] bump WASI SDK #98315
    9.0.0
  • [6.0] [warning] [android] [mono] libc.so.6 error - GLIBC_2.28 not found in node20, using node16 instead. Need OS upgrade. #98313
  • Support HttpClient custom logging outslide of HttpClientFactory #98312
  • [browser][MT] asynch dispatch soundness #98309
    9.0.0
  • [mono][marshal] Assertion should not be reached in mono_marshal_shared_conv_to_icall #98307
    9.0.0
  • [libraries-pgo] segfault in System.Linq.Tests #98292
    9.0.0
  • [libraries-jitstress] System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests fails with AV when `JitStress=2` #98290
    9.0.0
  • dotnot-host installer not found on system, cannot repair, install, fix or upgrade #98286
  • `INumber.Min(+QNaN, 1)` returns 1 #98285

Closed

  • System.DateTime.AddDays() adds additional tick #98305
  • Blazor Init Log Messages on Safari #93622
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Allow `WasmDebugLevel=0` for debug builds #94174
    9.0.0
  • Blazor WASM Custom debug configs need <DebuggerSupport Condition="''$(Configuration)' == 'DebugCustom'">true</DebuggerSupport> #96239
    8.0.x
  • Test duration reported by `dotnet test` is inaccurate for xUnit async tests #98205
  • NativeAOT: Reporting of the exceptions in the event viewer #73998
    9.0.0
  • Removal of PAL versions of floor, floorf, log, modf and modff has broken PAL test suite #98295
    9.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml test failure on OSX #1417
    Future
  • LongContinuationChain_ContinueWith_DoesNotStackOverflow test failing on Mono in CI #2084
    9.0.0
  • `JIT/jit64/opt/rngchk/RngchkStress2.cs` failing to build with `error CS8078: An expression is too long or complex to compile` #87879
    9.0.0
  • Confusing NullReferenceException on default ImmutableArray #98300
  • Update pinned System.Reflection.Metadata and System.Collections.Immutable versions to 8.0.0 #96809
  • ToString() function in HttpQSCollection inside of System.Web.HttpUtility does not URL encode names #97826
    Future
  • [superpmi-collect] Widespread failures during collection #98287
    9.0.0
  • Can't build with libs.src+libs.ref on Windows #97029
    Future
  • NegotiateStream with ProtectionLevel.Sign failed in .NET 8 #97942
    9.0.0
  • [browser][AOT] wasm-ld : error : initial memory too small #96840
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Test timing out - `DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.CreateGoodBreakpointAndHitGoToWasmPageWithoutAssetsComeBackAndHitAgain` #95343
  • [wasm] AOT: `System.Text.Json.Tests` crashing inexplicably #89984
    9.0.0
  • Can't build COMReference with dotnet build #97125
  • "No LC_RPATH's found" when loading native libraries on macOS #96337

PullRequests

Created

  • Update unified build controls #98330
    needs-area-label
  • Delete unnecessary test exclusion #98329
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #98328
    needs-area-label
  • [manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #98326
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #98325
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.28
  • JIT: update block weight for uncond to cond flow opt #98324
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix remaining issues before enabling new EH by default #98322
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [VMR] Add metabuild properties to enable property-controlled VMR build modes. #98321
    source-build, area-Build-mono, needs-area-label
  • [Mono] [Amd64/WASM] Disable vector constructors intrinsics #98320
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Don't allow creating 1-byte dead basic blocks #98319
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't allow preinitialization to skip dataflow #98318
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Use the same code to emit Vector/Vector<T> intrinsics on … #98317
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_GG_3A` to `SVE_GH_3A` #98316
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make ordering an explicit part of `CountBy` and `AggregateBy` testing. #98311
    area-System.Linq
  • JIT ARM64 SVE: Add FZ_2A, HG_2A, GZ_3A, GV_3A, GY_3*, DV_4A #98310
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Ensure the assert in IsEmbMaskOp is correct #98306
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] preparation for deputy #98298
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Vector64: Avoid GSCookies in Vector64 software fallback #98293
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Log ManagedThreadId and NativeThreadId for known test failures #98291
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser

Merged

  • Manually depad RSAES-PKCS1 on Apple OSes #97738
    area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Move more casts to the late cast expansion phase #98273
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] ServiceKey comparisons use Equals for matching #96847
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] Implement faster RSA key check #98010
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, os-linux, 8.0.3
  • Display names of handles in dumps #97573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[browser][mt] AsyncTransactionScopeTests.VerifyBYOTSyncTSNestedAsync - Value is not null " #98221
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix debugger support #97213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix missing short stack define #98128
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that Vector512 uses the same patterns as Vector64/128/256 #98115
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, 8.0.3
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #97071
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add ca-certificates to Mariner 2.0 deps #98267
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/7.0-staging] Add ca-certificates to Mariner 2.0 deps #98268
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/6.0-staging] Add ca-certificates to Mariner 2.0 deps #98269
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Report unhandled exceptions/FailFast in event log #98152
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Intrinsify multiple LoadVector API's #98077
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Partial revert "Enable native AOT for non-portable crossgen2 (#97536)" #98303
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix PAL tests break #98301
    area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix regex lazy loop handling of backtracking state at max iteration limit #97927
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.x
  • avoid some allocations during TLS handshake #97348
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Update SqlClient and ship Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #97884
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.28
  • Remove SharedFramework test helper in host tests in favor of TestArtifact #98260
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix polluted CompareState when comparing element types in a signature #98249
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • [NativeAOT][8.0] Use ld_classic in ILC build and in build integration #97856
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][debugger] Send assembly_load events while invoking methods using debugger-libs #98254
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.3
  • [wasm][bench] Fix Blazor First UI measurement #98308
    area-Build-mono
  • Change stack size on all desktop platforms to at least 1.5MB #98007
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix constant folding for arm64 MultiplyByScalar operations involving Vector2.One #98150
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Send assembly_load events while invoking methods using debugger-libs #98253
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Fix `Compiler::pickGDV` in `JitDump`/`EnableExtraSuperPmiQueries` #98289
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr
  • Ensure that SetContainsAVX passes in the regSize #98283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix URL encoding of HttpUtility.ParseQueryString's ToString method #98263
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Cleanup NoWarn in Crossgen2Tasks.csproj #98294
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: isinst(cls, null) -> null #98284
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix build with Android 26 NDK (which has some nullability annotations) #97976
    area-System.Net, os-android, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Fix Windows implementation of NegotiateAuthenticationPal.GetMIC #98031
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Convert operand of newarr to int when producing reverse P/Invoke array marshalling #98025
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Build support for linux-bionic-arm / linux-musl-arm #97996
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Spanify parts of IL reading in ILCompiler #97794
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fast FieldInfo reflection #98199
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance
  • Restore RSA 16384 tests to innerloop #98102
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Update where and when vzeroupper is emitted #98261
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add FR_2A, GB_2A, FV_2A, FY_3A #98248
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Remove C FILE PAL wrappers #98238
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add interface implementing type to OverrideInformation and use where it makes sense #98274
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • [browser] Use standard xunit test runner on multithreaded runtime #91317
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Clear _cacheInvalid flag after rebuilding limiter cache in DefaultPartitionedRateLimiter #98075
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [wasm][wasi] Throw error when WasmBuildNative is explicitly set to false during a single-file build #98087
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Use intrinsics in TensorPrimitives.PopCount for sizeof(T) == 1 #98281
    area-System.Numerics
  • Use highest thread priority in linux #89848
    area-GC-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix IsFixupPrecodeByASM and StubPrecode::IsStubPrecodeByASM #95859
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Support for WASI threads #98120
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-wasi
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #97070
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #97072
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for linux/arm64 #97910
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • fix SendTo with SocketAsyncEventArgs #98134
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Initialize native layout info for small structs during type load #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Canonicalize loop exits #98096
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use new MacOS arm64 pool for official builds #98117
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix gc-related bugs in risc-v emitter #98226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EmbedUntrackedSources causes slower build and is now enabled by default. #38691
  • Unify .sln and Directory.Build.props into a single file #38687
  • Dotnet tool to push nuget packages and their dependencies in the correct order... #38683
  • Unable to install, update or clean unsigned preview workloads reliably. #38681

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38692
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix PublishAot with PublishSingleFile #38680
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Do not import LKG overlay targets in VMR build in general #38695
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve roslyn version mismatch error message #38690
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38608
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #38610
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38609
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add MSI garbage collection for side-by-side workload manifests #38143
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix links in .gitignore #30066
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [`dotnet list package`]Resolve relative paths #38306
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Install Records for VS Managed Workloads During 'Update' #38346
    Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set

PullRequests

  • Update params-collections.md based on recent LDM decisions #7930

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Exception from Visual Studio while coding #72076
  • Exception from Visual Studio while coding #72075
  • Exception from Visual Studio while coding #72074
  • Develop a plan for testing MSBuildWorkspace against a variety of SDK versions #72071
  • Exception from Visual Studio while coding #72067
  • ForAttributeWithMetadataName could run faster if the tree stored a bit on nodes that contained attributes or not. #72066
  • Add `WorkspaceKind.Primary` and use it for VisualStudioWorkspace #72064
  • CSC Crash: This program location is thought to be unreachable. File='/_/src/Compilers/CSharp/Portable/Symbols/FunctionTypeSymbol.cs' Line=144 #72056
    17.10
  • Codefix suggestion: use collection expression spread when collection types don't match #72055

Closed

  • Regular occurrence of `CSharpIntroduceParameterCodeRefactoringProvider` error #72034
  • NotNullIfNotNull also requires casting to non-nullable type for valuetypes #71728

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not attempt to update generated code in 'Convert to record' #72073
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve NotNullWhenFalse_ReturningObject test #72072
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Experiment to grab 4 more bits for use as node flags. #72070
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add tests validating behavior #72068
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle all workspaces in VS impl of ISolutionAnalyzerSetterWorkspaceService #72065
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use collection expressions in IDE code. #72063
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change NullableWalker.VisitConversion to not unsplit #72062
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix race conditions in TestNoBlockOnCompletionItems4 #72061
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix race condition in RequestExecutionQueue #72059
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Always publish logs for CI builds #72058
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-add EA.RazorCompiler IVT #72057
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove the AllSyntaxTreesParsed compilation tracker state. #72021
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch analyzer to be a syntax node analyzer #72049
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix crash in Introduce Parameter where ObjectCreationExpressionSyntax were being casted to InvocationExpressions #72060
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Break a cycle through attributes #72041
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into ParamsCollections #72042
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Restored the reverted XAML PR (Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170) #71758
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Improve use of SyntaxContext in snippet and method/type import completion providers #71872
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Restore background loading for RoslynPackage #72054
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support relative paths in interceptors #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Definition items #71959
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Make getting a frozen partial snapshot async. #72026
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove -windows TFM being used in MSBuild tests #72040
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cache frozen partial solution snapshots acquired off of a solution instance #71999
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove "is final document state" from compilation trackers. #72045
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined conversions #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [VB] Improve casting from floating-point or decimal types to integer types in more cases #71838
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Onboard C# Intellisense page to Unified Settings #71780
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement control flow graph for Lock object feature #71987
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor where we do project type detection and sending telemetry #71969
    Area-IDE
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix quick info for anonymous types not escaping identifiers named as keywords #72047
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Option type renames #71958
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix NRE in primary constructor XML doc binder #72006
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Add compilation start / stop ETW events #72031
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: mvc #53969
  • DataProtectorTokenProvider constructor with ILogger #53963
  • Nested Editor<T> crashing because of bug in HtmlFieldPrefix.Combine method #53956
    8.0.x
  • QuickGrid: Add Column Virtualization #53953
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf improvement: json, json #53952

Closed

  • Update WiX dependencies #53974
    9.0-preview2
  • Conditionally provided parameters in Blazor's razor syntax #47142
  • Usability: PathString.StartsWithSegments() with a trailing slash is not intuitive behavior #2713
    Backlog
  • Invalid Anti-Forgery Token on OIDC Response #53868
  • DotNet.createJSObjectReference TS Type (transfer from DotNet.createJSObjectReference, Issue #530)) #53944
  • Postback on blazor InteractiveServer doesn't work #53950
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #53926
  • Perf regression: fortunes #53948

PullRequests

Created

  • Update build to use a local package cache from a submodule and build offline #53975
    area-infrastructure
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.2.24112.1 #53955
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Update Wix version #53973
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.28
  • Update Microsoft.Data.SqlClient version to 2.1.7 #53771
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.28
  • [release/7.0] Update Wix version #53972
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.17
  • [release/8.0] Fix closing SignalR Websocket connection on server close #53408
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.3
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4565741` to `4872968` #53846
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.17
  • [release/8.0] SignalR performance: track groups per connection, remove on disconnect #53862
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-signalr, 8.0.3
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `dddb219` to `4872968` #53845
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.28
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Prevent error boundaries from handling exceptions of type `NavigationException` #53968
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix hot reload memory leak #53928
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] Update Wix version #53971
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Pass the member info directly #53892
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.3
  • Update Wix version #53970
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • PathString.StartsWithSegments: Clarify trailing slash behavior in doc comments #53924
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • Update Identity dependencies #53883
    area-infrastructure
  • Update OAuthHandler.cs #53762
    community-contribution, area-security
  • [release/8.0] Disable buffering of Blazor streaming responses #53930
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Disable buffering of Blazor streaming responses #53929
    area-blazor
  • #52067 input number range type #52747
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet trace convert causes a crash on s390x #4506
  • `dotnet-trace` speedscope report: the call of one method is divided into different pieces #4490
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Replace logging for logging abstractions in netcore.client library #4296
  • Prepare the FabricBot config for migration to Policy Service #4504

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Regression] [Android] [Maps] Map locks up after adding ~200-300 locations to Polyline #20532
  • "Codesign exited with code 1" issue when try to build an iOS app using visual studio 2022 for mac, Rider and VS Code #20530
  • MAUI Apps cannot be restored in locked mode. #20522
  • ListView in iOS Displays Incorrect Text After Scrolling #20519
    Backlog
  • Shadow not rendering properly[Android] #20518
    Backlog
  • [OneLoc] Localization of templates and resources files #20515
    .NET 9 Planning
  • WinUI crash at shell navigation #20514

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider making compiled model tests more fine-grained #33075
  • JSON columns throws Invalid token type: 'StartObject' exception with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() #33073
  • Structured data in nested Json can't be set to null #33071
  • Thoughts or ideas around high perf scenarios with EF #33070
  • Polymorph entity (TPH) with select-mapping and FirstOrDefault - could not be translated #33069
  • Consider raising provider-specific concurrency exceptions as DbUpdateConcurrencyException #33068
  • Unecessary SELECT Inside LEFT Join #33067
  • Issue with the Discriminator column after upgrade to version 8.0 #33066
  • The data type geography cannot be used as an operand to the UNION, INTERSECT or EXCEPT operators because it is not comparable #33065
  • ETag value included slash to escape quotes #33064

Closed

  • JSON materialization code is not resilient to empty string #33074
  • UseTpcMappingStrategy() results in a mapping strategy of TPH in EF Core 8.1 #33063

PullRequests

Merged

  • [TEST ONLY] Move AdHoc tests relying on MARS to SqlServer suite #33076
    auto-merge
  • Small fixes done during EFCore.PG 9.0.0-preview.1 sync #33060
  • [TEST ONLY] moving tests for #32972 to relational so we also test SqLite #33050
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Add OptimizeContext MSBuild target #33049
  • [release/8.0] Fix OPENJSON postprocessing with split query (#32978) #33027

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-12
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Enable installer and SDK repos in VMR build #18632
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #18628
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #18625
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #18624
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #18623

Merged

  • Do not copy restored package content if already exists #18626
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #18334
    Branch Lockdown
  • Change log message verbosity in resolver to "Low" #18622
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #18561
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #18587
  • Update WiX to latest release #18599
  • Update to latest WiX version #18606
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Update to latest WiX version #18607
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Update WiX to latest release #18601
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Update WiX to latest release #18602
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Update WiX to latest release #18603
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Update WiX to latest release #18604
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Update WiX to latest release #18605
  • Ignore false positive license ref in SBRP #18620
  • Enable templating and roslyn-analyzers in UB #18618

Updated

  • Remove cloaked binaries #18563
  • [VMR] Enable all Android & Linux Bionic Mono CI lanes #18560
  • Isolate package flow between repos #18557
  • Put artifacts in well-known locations #18591
  • Stop syncing `main-ub` branch #18564
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #18588
